alert.note: Alert for Crosby; Lubbock; Lynn (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 14 at 10:25PM CDT until September 14 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lubbock Texas has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Lubbock County in northwestern Texas... Northeastern Lynn County in northwestern Texas... Southwestern Crosby County in northwestern Texas... * Until 1100 PM CDT. * At 1025 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Downtown Lubbock, or near Lubbock, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lubbock, Slaton, Idalou, Ransom Canyon, Texas Tech University, Downtown Lubbock, Lubbock South Plains Mall, Woodrow, Lubbock International Airport, Wilson, Buffalo Springs, and Lubbock Science Spectrum. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
